titleStmt.title: The Iesuits antepast conteining, a repy against a pretensed aunswere to the Downe-fall of poperie, lately published by a masked Iesuite Robert Parsons by name, though he hide himselfe couertly vnder the letters of S.R. which may fitly be interpreted (a sawcy rebell.)
titleStmt.author: Bell, Thomas, fl. 1593-1610.

titleStmt.title: The Iesuits antepast conteining, a repy against a pretensed aunswere to the Downe-fall of poperie, lately published by a masked Iesuite Robert Parsons by name, though he hide himselfe couertly vnder the letters of S.R. which may fitly be interpreted (a sawcy rebell.)
titleStmt.author: Bell, Thomas, fl. 1593-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by VVilliam Iaggard dwelling in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Smith, Richard. An answer to Thomas Bels late challeng named by him the Downfal of popery.
Running title reads: The Iesuites antepast.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
